page.title: 07Hamble again two
page.content:
Although a glass reinforced plastic motor launch was used at one time the present ferry_man prefers the traditional wooden boat,with a diesel engine.It carries a maximum of 12 people and if it is not totally full a few bicycles as well.
{THE MARINAS AND YACHTING FACILITIES}
Although the River Hamble has been of yachting significance for many years,it is only recently that the marinas have been built.
Rank Marine International owns both Mercury Yacht Harbour and Port Hamble Marina.Mercury Yacht Harbour has 323 alongside deep water births on its 3 pontoons.Water and electricity are provided on the pontoons,and toilets,washing facilities, a car park
